task.title: Prepare the Work Area
task.shortdesc: You should prepare your work area prior to cleaning or repairing your typewriter to ensure a safe maintenance process.

step.cmd: Select a well-ventilated space, ideally with windows and access to direct sunlight.
Lay out paper towels or plastic sheeting to fully cover your work surface.
Put on nitrile gloves so that mineral spirits, cleaning agents, and waxes do not touch your skin.
